name: Salah Uddin
bio: Salah Uddin is an award-winning chef, cookbook author, and educator. He specializes in Bengali and regional Bengali cuisine, and has been featured in numerous media outlets.

recipes.name: Chicken Biryani
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Marinate the chicken with spices. 2. Cook the rice and chicken separately. 3. Layer the rice and chicken in a pot. 4. Cook on low heat until the biryani is ready.

recipes.name: Fish Curry
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Fry the fish until golden brown. 2. Cook the onion, tomato, and spices in oil. 3. Add water and cook until the curry is thickened. 4. Add the fish and cook for a few more minutes.

recipes.name: Rasgulla
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Boil the milk and add lemon juice to curdle it. 2. Strain the curdled milk and knead it to make cheese. 3. Make small balls and boil them in sugar syrup. 4. Add cardamom and rose water for flavor.

name: Fahim Morol
bio: Fahim Morol is an Bengali-born actress, food and travel writer, and television personality. She is best known for her expertise in Bengali cuisine and has written several cookbooks on the subject.

recipes.name: Palak Paneer
recipes.method: 1. Cook spinach and blend into a paste. 2. Fry onions and tomatoes. 3. Add spices and spinach. 4. Add paneer and cook for 10 minutes. 5. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Fish Curry
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Fry the fish until golden brown. 2. Cook the onion, tomato, and spices in oil. 3. Add water and cook until the curry is thickened. 4. Add the fish and cook for a few more minutes.

name: Mehdi Hassan
bio: Mehdi Hassan is a Michelin-starred chef who has worked in some of the world's most prestigious kitchens. He is known for his modern take on Bengali cuisine, and has authored several cookbooks.

recipes.name: Butter Chicken
recipes.cooking_method: 1. Cook the chicken in spices. 2. Make a tomato gravy with onion and spices. 3. Add cream and butter to the gravy. 4. Add the chicken and simmer until the sauce is thickened.

name: Sujon Miah
bio: Sujon Miah is a British Bengali author, television personality, and chef. She is known for her healthy and modern take on Bengali cuisine, and has authored several cookbooks.

bio: Imran Ali is an Bengali-born Michelin-starred chef, restaurateur, cookbook author, and humanitarian. He is known for his modern take on Bengali cuisine, and has authored several cookbooks.

name: Hassan Ahmed
bio: Hassan Ahmed is a Bengali Muslim chef who specializes in traditional Bengali cuisine. He has over 10 years of experience and is known for his expertise in creating delicious and authentic Bengali dishes.
